title: Pittsburgh black and blue steak, fried duck egg and bone marrow with radish and watercress
description: 'Pittsburgh black and blue' refers to how the steak looks when served - charred on the outside (black) and very rare on the inside (blue).
ingredients: 2 x 2½cm/1in cut bone marrows, with a hole wide enough to fit a teaspoon
flaked sea salt and black pepper
2 tsp vegetable oil, plus extra for frying
6 breakfast radishes, green tops left on, washed
½ cucumber, peeled, seeds removed and cut into 5mm slices
